snippet: John Hawkes, now in “The Sessions,” is an actor well regarded for his range and diversity, but, for a long time, not very well known.
abstract: John Hawkes is playing the lead in The Sessions, film that he wrote based on the true story of Mark O'Brien, journalist and poet who had contracted polio as a young boy and spent most of his life in an iron lung; Hawkes is an actor well regarded for his range and diversity, but, for a long time, not very well known.
lead_paragraph: John Hawkes, now in “The Sessions,” is an actor well regarded for his range and diversity, but, for a long time, not very well known.

headline.seo: John Hawkes Brings Years of Film Work to ‘The Sessions’
headline.main: Who’s That Man in the Iron Lung?
headline.print_headline: Who’s That Man in the Iron Lung?
